events.title: Introduction
events.content: Hello! I'm SoonSong Cheok, a passionate Computer Science graduate from Oregon State University with a CGPA of 3.91. I originally from Malaysia, where I completed my Bachelor's degree in Mechatronics Engineering. I decided to specialize in software engineering, driven by a passion for data engineering and algorithm design.

Throughout my studies and professional experiences, I've tackled diverse projects—from debugging and troubleshooting in teaching assistant roles to hands-on security architecture at a large university. I enjoy the challenge of designing efficient, high-performance software, leveraging my skills in Python, C/C++, and machine learning.

Currently, I'm seeking a full-time role in software engineering or AI engineer, but I’m open to exploring other areas where my skills and curiosity can make an impact. Let’s connect and see how we can create something innovative together!

events.title: Mar 2022 - Jun 2024, M.S. in Computer Science
events.content: Completed my Master in Computer Science Major with AI minor.

events.title: Sep 2023 - Jun 2024, Complete collaboration with HP Inc.
events.content: Collaborated and designed an AI solution for faster ink density detection.

events.title: Sep 2023 - Jun 2024, Graduate Teaching Assistant
events.content: Provided guidances for over 300 student throughout a year.

events.title: 2020, Hand Gesture Recognition System
events.content: Developed an Hand gesture recognition system for Final Year Project. Powered by AI.

events.title: Feb 2019 - Aug 2019, MIT Solutions Software Engineer (Intern) at Intel
events.content: Developed a web application and provide technique support.
